body_html: @meteorcloudy It took around 15 minutes (Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz). Its just yesterday I had the necessity to build tensor flow on windows. So, I directly tried the last method you suggested. I didn't try building it using CMake.
